Headline: #49 Western Temporary Northbound Reroute near Western/18th
ShortDescription: Northbound 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Cermak, Damen, Roosevelt, and Western due to street blockage near Western/18th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Cermak, Damen, Roosevelt, and Western due to street blockage near Western/18th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays  following earlier police activity at Cicero. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays  following earlier police activity at Cicero.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
